title: PM departs after concluding three-day visit to Saudi Arabia
content:
RIYADH, Nov 12 (APP): Caretaker Prime Minister Anwaar-ul-Haq Kakar on Sunday departed for Pakistan after completing his three-day official visit to Saudi Arabia.
At the King Khalid International Airport , he was seen off by the high diplomatic officials of Pakistan and Saudi Arabia.
During his visit, the prime minister represented Pakistan at the emergency meeting of the Organisation of Islamic Cooperation (OIC) on the situation in Gaza.
